e102.emailOrPasswordEmptydialogTitle: Please fill in both email and the password fields
e102.emailOrPasswordEmptyDescription: You seem to have forgotten to enter either the email or the password field, or both, Please try again
e102.loginErrorDialogContent: Invalid email/password combination. Please try again with valid login credentials!

noCurrentUser.dialogDescription: No current user with this information was found!

requiresRecentLogin.dialogDescription: You need to log back in again in order to perform this operation

operationNotAllowed.dialogDescription: You cannot register using this method at this moment!

userNotFound.dialogDescription: The given user was not found on the server!

weakPassword.dialogDescription: Please choose a stronger password consisting of more characters!

invalidEmail.dialogDescription: Please double check your email and try again!

emailAlreadyInUse.dialogDescription: Please choose another email to register with!
